sourcesContent: import { AddShoppingCart, Favorite, FavoriteBorder } from '@styled-icons/material-outlined' import Button from 'components/Button' import Ribbon, { RibbonColors, RibbonSizes } from 'components/Ribbon' import * as S from './styles' export type GameCardProps = { title: string developer: string img: string price: string promotionalPrice?: string favorite?: boolean onFav?: () => void ribbon?: React.ReactNode ribbonColor?: RibbonColors ribbonSize?: RibbonSizes } const GameCard = ({ title, developer, img, price, promotionalPrice, favorite = false, onFav, ribbon, ribbonColor = 'primary', ribbonSize = 'small' }: GameCardProps) => ( {!!ribbon && ( {ribbon} )} {title} {developer} {favorite ? ( ) : ( )} {!!promotionalPrice && {price}} {promotionalPrice || price}
